TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit DynamicActivity extends System.Activities.Activity implements class System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor

Docs.summary: Provides an object model that allows you to construct activities dynamically that interface with the WF designer and runtime using .

remarks.format:
## Examples The following example shows how to create a <xref:System.Activities.DynamicActivity>.
[!code-csharp[DynamicActivityCreation#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/dynamicactivitycreation/cs/program.cs#0)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Creates a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks With <xref:System.Activities.DynamicActivity> you can create new activities without creating new types. <xref:System.Activities.DynamicActivity> with its associated XAML support in <xref:System.Activities.XamlIntegration.ActivityXamlServices> allows new arguments to be defined in XAML and bound by the host without requiring XAML to be compiled.

Docs.summary: Gets the collection of attributes of the dynamically generated activity.
Returns a collection of activities that are configured to provide validation for the .
Gets or sets the execution logic of the activity.

remarks.format:
## Examples The following example shows how to specify the implementation for a dynamic activity.
[!code-csharp[DynamicActivityCreation#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/dynamicactivitycreation/cs/program.cs#0)]

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the implementation version of the activity.
Docs.value: The implementation version of the activity.

Docs.summary: The name to be displayed for the activity in the workflow designer.
Gets the collection of properties that map to the arguments of the dynamically generated activity.

MemberSignature.Value: .method hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.ComponentModel.AttributeCollection System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor.GetAttributes() cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns a collection of attributes of the dynamic activity.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This member is an explicit interface member implementation. It can be used only when the <xref:System.Activities.DynamicActivity> instance is cast to an <xref:System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor> interface.

MemberSignature.Value: .method hidebysig newslot virtual instance object System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor.GetPropertyOwner(class System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor pd) cil managed

Docs.param: The property whose owner is to be found.
Docs.summary: Returns this instance of the class.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The `pd` parameter is ignored by this method. This parameter is present to implement the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor> interface.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation. It can be used only when the <xref:System.Activities.DynamicActivity> instance is cast to an <xref:System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor> interface.
